definition: the will is there, but not the strength (idiom)/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
pinyin: xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2

definition: heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
surname Yu
(archaic) I/me/variant of 餘|余[yu2], surplus
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
surname Li
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
(negative prefix)/not/no
excessive
foot/to be sufficient/ample

sentences.english: I can only say that our ambition outstrips our ability.
sentences.chinese: 我只能说是心有余而力不足。

sentences.english: In fact, it is full of the mood to do, just fall.
sentences.chinese: 其实，这是满心情愿的事情，只是心有余而力不足。

definition: less capable than desirable (idiom); not as strong as one would wish/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
impotent (idiom)/powerless/helpless
to be up to one's ears in work (idiom)/to be unable to attend to other things at the same time
beyond one's reach or power (to do sth)
powerless/lacking strength
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
lit. pulling on the lapels exposes the elbows (idiom)/strapped for cash/unable to make ends meet
(jocularly) to be under great pressure (a pun on 亞歷山大|亚历山大[Ya4 li4 shan1 da4])
It's hard to clap with only one hand./It takes two to tango/It's difficult to achieve anything without support.
lit. the whip cannot reach (idiom); beyond one's influence/too far to be able to help
not good/of no use
to make progress only with great difficulty (idiom)
water in a distant place is of little use in putting out a fire right here/(fig.) a slow remedy does not address the current emergency
pinyin: yuan3 shui3 jiu4 bu5 liao3 jin4 huo3

definition: unable to help however much one would like to (idiom); Although we sympathize, there is no way to help you./My hands are tied.
to be unable to tolerate or endure/to find sth difficult to manage
to have no other choice/to be the last resort
pinyin: bu4 de2 yi3 er2 wei2 zhi1
